mat2str

Matrix to String.

Syntax

res = mat2str(M)
res = mat2str(M, 'class')
res = mat2str(M, P, 'class')

Input argument

M

a numerical 2D matrix or logical.

P

an integer value: precision, 15 by default.

Output argument

res

a string

Description

mat2str converts a matrix to a string.

This string may be used to reconstruct the original matrix with execstr function.

Example

R = mat2str(pi)
R = mat2str(pi, 'class')
R = mat2str(pi, 4)
R = mat2str(pi + i, 'class')
execstr(['RB = ', R])

See also

execstr.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
